name: Remission Possible
description:
Remission Possible is an educational 3D rail shooter about fighting cancer with microbubbles!  Steer your ship down winding blood vessels, collect bubbles of life-saving medicine, then use your ship's ultrasound to pop them and deliver their medicine wherever it's needed!

Complete missions and pass your training quizzes to unlock new abilities for your ship to give you better control over the microbubbles.  Choose the right bubble for the right purpose and destroy cancer cells more easily, causing less damage to the patient's blood vessels.

This game was made possible through the support of the National Science Foundation CAREER Award Number 1653992 and Dr. Michael Calvisi of the University of Colorado Colorado Springs.

The human circulatory system is a labyrinth of veins, arteries, and capillaries. Try not to get lost while you hunt down cancer cells!  Follow the white blood cells as they guide you to the cancer cells.

Microbubbles can be grabbed and launched by using your ship's tractor beam. There are three types of Microbubbles:  protein, lipid, and polymer. Can you master all three?


Learn to tune the Amplitude and Frequency settings of your ship's Ultrasound. You must use both in order to rupture your microbubble projectiles effectively!

Check your knowledge of your ship, blood cells, cancer, and microbubbles. If you do well, there might be a promotion headed your way! Flaunt your rank!
